purpose: defines character poses and orientation cues for sdxl; includes neutral, seated/reclined, dynamic, aerial, gestural, and prop-interaction variants with wildcard placeholders

categories.neutral: basic standing or stationary poses with neutral facing and simple posture
categories.seated_reclined: seated, kneeling, cross-legged, lounging, throne, and lying/reclining poses
categories.dynamic_action: movement and action stances (running, jumping, combat, performing); includes group formations
categories.aerial_floating: floating, hovering, levitating, mid-air, and wings-spread poses
categories.gestural_attitude: expressive gestures and stance cues (hands on hips, arms crossed, head tilt, gaze direction, mood)
categories.prop_interaction: holding/using objects and templates (books, devices, drinks, __std/xl/prop__)
